name: Dusty (GamesBySpinola)
description:
Hi everyone!

Dusty is the prototype for a 2D shooter platformer.

Be born out of the mist and help the Forest Spirit clean the forest from an evil plague.

Venture through a mysterious forest, solve different puzzles, kill different types of enemies, gain different abilities and clean the forest from an evil plague.

This is just a demo and it was meant to show what I have been working on as far as:

- Unity Particle System,

- UI, dialogs, cutscenes, different ways to call events

- Ability Pick Ups

- Enemy AI 

- Different types of projectile

Hope you have fun playing it and enjoy some bubbly shooting!!

As always fell free to donate and join my DISCORD if you fell like it!

Cheers.
